entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kitimat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 1.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending before morning then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon.
